bug.author: vishalbollu
bug.summary: Prevent *.nano and *.micro instance types during cluster spin up
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Version</denchmark-h>
0.12.0 <denchmark-h:h4>Description</denchmark-h>
Update validations to prevent users from spinning up clusters with instance types *.nano and *.micro.
